data.name: FeatureNotFound
data.value: Feature '{0}' was not found.
data.comment: Error message when a feature is not found. {0} is the feature ID.

data.name: FeatureNotFoundInLayer
data.value: Feature '{0}' was not found in layer '{1}'.
data.comment: Error message when a feature is not found in a specific layer. {0} is feature ID, {1} is layer ID.

data.name: LayerNotFound
data.value: The requested layer was not found.
data.comment: Error message when a layer is not found.

data.name: LayerNotFoundWithId
data.value: Layer '{0}' was not found.
data.comment: Error message when a specific layer is not found. {0} is the layer ID.

data.name: CollectionNotFound
data.value: Collection '{0}' was not found.
data.comment: Error message when a collection is not found. {0} is the collection ID.

data.name: ServiceUnavailable
data.value: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
data.comment: Error message when the service is unavailable.

data.name: InvalidParameters
data.value: The request contains invalid parameters.
data.comment: Error message for invalid request parameters.

data.name: InvalidGeometry
data.value: The geometry provided is invalid.
data.comment: Error message for invalid geometry.

data.name: InvalidBoundingBox
data.value: The bounding box '{0}' is invalid.
data.comment: Error message for invalid bounding box. {0} is the bounding box value.

data.name: InvalidCrs
data.value: The coordinate reference system '{0}' is not supported.
data.comment: Error message for unsupported CRS. {0} is the CRS identifier.

data.name: InvalidFormat
data.value: The format '{0}' is not supported.
data.comment: Error message for unsupported format. {0} is the format name.

data.name: DataStoreError
data.value: An error occurred while accessing the data store.
data.comment: Error message for data store errors.

data.name: CacheError
data.value: An error occurred while accessing the cache.
data.comment: Error message for cache errors.

data.name: MetadataError
data.value: An error occurred while accessing metadata.
data.comment: Error message for metadata errors.

data.name: QueryError
data.value: An error occurred while executing the query.
data.comment: Error message for query execution errors.

data.name: RasterError
data.value: An error occurred while processing raster data.
data.comment: Error message for raster processing errors.

data.name: SerializationError
data.value: An error occurred while serializing the response.
data.comment: Error message for serialization errors.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccess
data.value: You do not have permission to access this resource.
data.comment: Error message for unauthorized access.

data.name: Forbidden
data.value: Access to this resource is forbidden.
data.comment: Error message for forbidden access.

data.name: TooManyRequests
data.value: Too many requests. Please try again later.
data.comment: Error message for rate limiting.

data.name: InternalServerError
data.value: An internal server error occurred.
data.comment: Generic internal server error message.

data.name: NotImplemented
data.value: This feature is not implemented.
data.comment: Error message for not implemented features.

data.name: BadRequest
data.value: The request is malformed or invalid.
data.comment: Error message for bad requests.

data.name: MethodNotAllowed
data.value: The HTTP method '{0}' is not allowed for this resource.
data.comment: Error message for method not allowed. {0} is the HTTP method.

data.name: UnsupportedMediaType
data.value: The media type '{0}' is not supported.
data.comment: Error message for unsupported media type. {0} is the media type.

data.name: ConflictError
data.value: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.
data.comment: Error message for conflict errors.

data.name: GoneError
data.value: The requested resource is no longer available.
data.comment: Error message for resources that are gone.

data.name: PreconditionFailed
data.value: Precondition failed for this request.
data.comment: Error message for failed preconditions.

data.name: PayloadTooLarge
data.value: The request payload is too large.
data.comment: Error message for payload too large.

data.name: UriTooLong
data.value: The request URI is too long.
data.comment: Error message for URI too long.

data.name: RequiredParameter
data.value: The parameter '{0}' is required.
data.comment: Validation error for required parameter. {0} is the parameter name.

data.name: InvalidParameterValue
data.value: The value for parameter '{0}' is invalid.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid parameter value. {0} is the parameter name.

data.name: ParameterOutOfRange
data.value: The parameter '{0}' is out of range. Expected between {1} and {2}.
data.comment: Validation error for out of range parameter. {0} is parameter name, {1} is min, {2} is max.

data.name: CollectionsTitle
data.value: Feature Collections
data.comment: Title for collections endpoint.

data.name: CollectionsDescription
data.value: Access to data collections available in this API.
data.comment: Description for collections endpoint.

data.name: ConformanceTitle
data.value: Conformance Declaration
data.comment: Title for conformance endpoint.

data.name: ConformanceDescription
data.value: Information about the specifications and standards this API conforms to.
data.comment: Description for conformance endpoint.
